Bio-Weapons (Flu Radiation etc) Protection With Liposomal Vitamin C:
What proactive steps are you taking to protect you and your family from Engineered Bio-Weapons being used against the population? Taking a Flu Vaccine and hoping for the best?

This video is simply 2 videos made by others a while back spliced together. In fact, I had uploaded this video to PowerVideoTube about a year ago, but that site crashed and went away, along with everyone's videos.

The first part is the amazing story of a man in New Zealand who had contracted H1N1, who was put on a ventilator, and then left to die, basically, by the Doctors and hospital. . . that is until his family found a way to force the hospital to intravenously give the man mega-dose Vitamin C. Then later, the hospital decided that, even though the man's condition had shown drastic improvement, the Vitamin C could not have been the reason, so they discontinued the treatment. Only through Liposomal Vitamin C was the man's family able to save him from not only the H1N1, but the hospital as well.

The 2nd video illustrates a VERY SIMPLE & INEXPENSIVE WAY TO MAKE YOUR OWN LIPOSOMAL VITAMIN C. Here is a link to that video-maker's website with written instructions. on how to do it.

It seems that it might be a smart thing to get a jewelry cleaner, some Vitamin C, some soy lecithin (or alternative) and print out the directions on how to make it. (We may not always have the internet) We never know just how quickly things can change in this world, and where this kind of stuff can make a HUGE difference for ourselves or loved ones.

Japan's Secret World War II Death Lab:
Japan's Dirty Secret: The truth about Japan's secret facility at Harbin, used to manufacture germs that infected and killed thousands of Chinese during World War II.

Memories of Japanese war crimes continue to poison Japan's relations with its neighbours. Many Chinese are still suffering the effects of a vicious campaign of germ warfare.

"Our unit did things no human being should ever do," confesses Unit 731 member Yoshio Shinozuka. His unit developed the deadly pathogens which were used to infect 250,000 Chinese. Japan's refusal to apologise for its actions, or to acknowledge Unit 731's existence, has further upset its victims
